channel.title: Workshops on SoDa
channel.description: Recent content in Workshops on SoDa

item.title: Data Visualization Bootcamp
item.description: In October 2023, we hosted a workshop about data visualization.

item.title: Network science
item.description: In June 2023, we hosted a workshop about Network Science.

item.title: Causal Impact Assesment
item.description: In May 2023, we hosted a workshop in Causal Impact Assesment focusing on policy interventions.

item.title: [UPCOMING] Supercomputing for social scientists with R
item.description: In February 2024, we will host a workshop regarding Cluster Computing for Social Scientists with R.

item.title: Efficient programming with CBS microdata
item.description: In May 2022, we hosted a workshop about efficient programming for accessing CBS microdata.

item.title: How to create synthetic data
item.description: In September 2022, we hosted a workshop about synthetic data.
